pullRequest.title: Merge watcher classes for sessions into one class
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also make sure to add local session to watcher in the case where it is
added at a later time than when the watcher was created
Commit no. 2 from #13636 and additional changes mentioned above.
Please review only.

commit.message:
Merge watcher classes for sessions into one class

Also make sure to add local session to watcher in the case where it is
added at a later time than when the watcher was created

nodes.bodyText: I suggest to add yourself as author since you have created the class/file.
